website_summaries.verdict: Beats the competitors on nearly every front – strength, security, and versatility. If you need a powerful padlock, this is it.
pros: Boasts heavy-duty features that stand up to almost any use – core-hardened lock body and shackle, hardened steel construction, and 25,000-pound prying pressure capacity
cons: It's the most costly model on our shortlist, but you get rock-solid quality for the price

customer_reviews.title: Too Big For Its Own Good
customer_reviews.text: What a fantastic lock. A strong first line of defense. The only issue I have is that it won’t fit my Abus chain. There needs to be better details on chain/lock dimensions so we can make sure what we get from Abus will fit together. Even after ordering a new Abus chain from an on line Abus dealer, the lock still won’t fit through the chains link. There really should be a compatibility chart. Life is tough enough without having to guess at a high dollar purchases intercompatabilty
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely phenomenal lock - but items I received had been opened
customer_reviews.text: I recently purchased several ABUS padlocks and chains and IMO they're incredible deterrents - the best locks and chains I've ever seen. Unfortunately the packaging for the two 37/80 locks I received had been cut open and the main cardboard piece that contains the lock name and information was missing. Normally this wouldn't be a big deal to me if it had been any other product, but the locks include coding cards in the event you lose the keys or need to get new ones cut. Who knows who has this information since the packaging had been cut open? The lock deserves 5 stars - but I'm leaving 1 star because the item wasn't new as described.
customer_reviews.author: Stash Gretzky

customer_reviews.title: THESE ARE NOT NEW LOCKS - DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: Ordered two, received two locks, they had been opened prior and are missing parts etc.
customer_reviews.author: Shaun

customer_reviews.title: Nearly un-usable
customer_reviews.text: This is definitely a sturdy lock. I purchased it for a cross country move. The problem is I couldn't use it for the Truck, Trailer, Hitch or storage unit The locking bar is so thick it didn't fit anything, even commercial grade Penske Trucks and U-Haul Trailers. Check that your hasp and make sure it fits. Its basically a boat anchor ...
customer_reviews.author: NollCraft

customer_reviews.title: Great lock. The shackle is thick and the opening is tight. Make sure it works for your use.
customer_reviews.text: Great lock. Well built and reliable. I have.a Squire that I bought from the U.K. with an Almax security chain. I switched to the Abus even though it has a lower rating for physical attacks. The key is nicer to work with. Check the specs closely and compare to the item you want to lock. The shackle has very tight clearance to make it difficult to get bolt cutters or a cutting disc on it
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: A tank of locks.
customer_reviews.text: Ok. The shackle doesn't fit on a storage unit. But Q&A pointed that out and I just didn't read. So I cannot use it for my intended purpose. However this is a beast of a lock. It is amazing. So I will keep it and l am sure I can use if for something later. Great lock.
customer_reviews.author: Nag.Jon.in.Chi

customer_reviews.title: Great lock
customer_reviews.text: This is a high security lock. Was looking for good lock for a storage locker. After researching on line I found this was one of the hardest locks to pick and great quality. The lock is thick and and may not fit on all storage type lockers. I was looking for a high quality lock to secure several $$$$ worth of stuff in storage and didn’t want to go with a $10 lock. Great lock but a little pricy
customer_reviews.author: jim andreae

customer_reviews.title: A beast of a lock
customer_reviews.text: I did some research on lock picking before I bought this one. Definitely a well-built and secure lock. don't think you're gonna cut this with bolt cutters. A die grinder would be the only way and that would make a lot of noise. An expensive lock but well worth the money. I would definitely buy this again
customer_reviews.author: Mich

customer_reviews.title: One key came bent and broken. Don't buy
customer_reviews.text: Ok it's a warehouse deal, but at least send it complete. Not with a broke key.
customer_reviews.author: Eduardo PTY

customer_reviews.title: I like this lock
customer_reviews.text: I like this lock, I bought it for may bicycle, I ordered the chain Laclede 1/2”. Square “ Lockdown “ security chain, it doesn’t work together, I just order a Viro Monolith 1/2 security lock for my 1/2 chain and another chain for this ABUS 37RK/80 lock that be able to fix ( Almax security chain inmobiliario 16mm). If you want this lock for 1/2 chain it’s not going to attach it .youll see in my pictures.
customer_reviews.author: Antonio F. Norwood

customer_reviews.title: Won't work for most normal applications.
customer_reviews.text: Will not fit most standard lock openings. Solid as a rock.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Collins

customer_reviews.title: Super Beefy and good but shank / shackle is too thick
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to protect a garage I am renting. The purchase / shipping was good. When I went to use it, the shackle would not fit in the designated hole. I had to exchange it for the 37/60 model. That works well for my application. If you have any thought this might not fit, get the 37/60. It is the same only smaller. I also contacted Abus and ordered extra keys based on the product serial number.
customer_reviews.author: Spencer Tillim

customer_reviews.title: One Mean Machine
customer_reviews.text: If a piece of garbage scumbag thief can get through this lock, I'd be very impressed. This lock is Bad to the Bone in every way, and I have no concerns using it to secure valuables. If a cockroach, I mean thief, gets past the lock it will likely be because of another weak link, not the lock. So my suggestion would be to pair it with something equally strong so it limits to options to the low lifes out there that choose to steal.
customer_reviews.author: Tom W.

customer_reviews.title: Great lock, will deter all but the most professional thieves.
customer_reviews.text: Now THIS is a lock! For the money you won't do better. And I like the completely removable shackle, it makes locking/unlocking easier. Also, Abloy padlocks might be a little more pickproof, but this baby will deter anyone without a grinder (almost any lock can be ground open, but that's noisy, and it takes some time). If you get a lock like this, then the weak point in your security will be the chain, and/or the hasp. Then the door materiel. Don't waste money on an expensive padlock unless you cover all the other bases, too.
customer_reviews.author: Smokey

customer_reviews.title: Great lock !
customer_reviews.text: The Abus 37/80 padlock is one of the srongest in the world. It is body hardened to 56 to 58 on the Rockwell scale and core hardened to 61 to 63 on the same scale. The only locks that are stronger are the Sargent & Greenleaf 833c and the 961c, $1,200 & $1,400 USD respectively. Abus locks are very hard to pick, even for someone with knowledge and the tools to pick it. In this respect the only lock in the world that cannot be picked or bumped are made by Abloy of Sweden, they are strong locks but not as strong as the Abus lock.
customer_reviews.author: Montagne

customer_reviews.title: Thieves should look for an easier target or get a job.
customer_reviews.text: The lock is heavy and very strong looking. It is most impressive. Note that the shackle is 9/16. The shackle was too large for my rented storage unit. Be sure to check your intended use and ensure that the hole will accept 9/16, otherwise consider getting a smaller shackle. Unfortunately the box had been crudely opened by someone, which was not appreciated.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Built like a tank!
customer_reviews.text: I needed the best security for my motorcycle as I unfortunately have to leave it parked outside in my car port. I needed a bomb proof lock that I could trust and after plenty of research, I discovered this was the lock of all locks. I paired this up with an Abus chain and now I don't have to worry about anyone making off with my bike.
customer_reviews.author: Mack daddy mode

customer_reviews.title: This is the best in the world
customer_reviews.text: This is the best in the world. Yes, in the world. They are not cheap but if some European insurance companies require the ABUS Granite when securing a motor cycle or moped, that speaks volumes.
customer_reviews.author: JWagner

customer_reviews.title: Impressive in weight and size.
customer_reviews.text: While I have no intention of testing the lock against a portable electric grinder I am hoping it’s size and girth is a deterrent long enough to return to my bicycle.
customer_reviews.author: JimK

customer_reviews.title: One of the best security locks
customer_reviews.text: One of the best locks for your security you can buy. They will cut a chain before trying to pick it defeat this lock. Use security chains with this lock? Home Depot chains cut like butter.
customer_reviews.author: John R. Herr Jr.

customer_reviews.title: It's huge, it's heavy and it's BAD ASS
customer_reviews.text: This lock is a BEAST. Only downfall is it really won't fit anything. It will not fit on a Storage unit. If you have a need for extreme security, this is your lock. But you will also need to buy the hasp made for this lock or the chain
customer_reviews.author: big country

customer_reviews.title: ROCK SOLID!
customer_reviews.text: Rock solid lock, quite sturdy!! From my research this is one of the best around! Glad I got it, love the LED lit key.
customer_reviews.author: Sir Ace

customer_reviews.title: Super lock outstanding value
customer_reviews.text: This heavy and strong/solid lock is virtually pick proof (except for a handful of expert pickers) and a great value for a lock used to secure tank hatches.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: This thing is a beast. Brute-Force attack? Nope ...
customer_reviews.text: This thing is a beast. Brute-Force attack? Nope. The chain you use with this is probably weaker. Quickest way into it is to pick it open with a disc-detent lock picking tool and some skills that not a lot of people have. There's a reason this thing is called the "Insurance Lock".
customer_reviews.author: Michael M

customer_reviews.title: Used unit
customer_reviews.text: Received used product. These have codes for the keys so to receive an item that has been previously opened is really bad and unsafe.
customer_reviews.author: Rolassa

customer_reviews.title: Looks like a good lock.
customer_reviews.text: I like the security rating of the lock. Using it to secure tractor on trailer.
customer_reviews.author: jelmer

customer_reviews.title: The real deal.
customer_reviews.text: ABUS makes some of the best Locks out there and the ABUS 37KR / 80 is one of the best. Fast delivery and good packaging. Couldn't be Happier. Well, unless they start giving these Locks away for FREE ;)
customer_reviews.author: JDaddabbo

customer_reviews.title: I'm very happy with this lock
customer_reviews.text: I've never seen a lock built with this degree of quality. Very impressive. Expensive, but not compared to losing a $15K motorcycle, I'm very happy with this lock.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew H

customer_reviews.title: Too big
customer_reviews.text: Great lock but the top is too big around to fit in many latches
customer_reviews.author: Edm

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: I was tired of buying the cheap imported stuff like Master Lock so I ordered this,made in Germany and definitely worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Brad58

customer_reviews.title: Great lock for a reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: Great lock for a reasonable price. One thing was interesting was that the location I was using it for had a hole that was just slightly smaller than the diameter of the lock, and found out that the holding location was easier to cut/drill than sanding down the hardened lock. I researched quite a lot to pick this lock, good medium scale lock above the quality of your general master type lock.
customer_reviews.author: Bob L.

customer_reviews.title: Well made, quality item.
customer_reviews.text: This one was a close out model... price was excellent because of that... but reason for price cut was not apparent. Still a good, well made product.. just lacking features that the 37/60 has.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Gillespie

customer_reviews.title: Great lock!
customer_reviews.text: Great lock! Unfortunately it didn't fit my PODS container so I had to return it. Extremely sturdy, basically the best lock you can get for something of this size. Bought it after reading/watching a number of review comparisons.
customer_reviews.author: Justin R.

customer_reviews.title: Impressive lock that is of very limited use.
customer_reviews.text: Lock is impressive but hole won't hold a cable that is also impressive. Shackel is big and probably won't fit in typical situations.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Most secure lock I've ever owned
customer_reviews.text: I just bought a high ticket item that I've put off before cause I was worried about having it ripped off, no worries now, the lock and chain are completely fantastic, sure nothing is 100 % safe but this combo will make it easier sleeping at night.
customer_reviews.author: David White

customer_reviews.title: Great lock, but too big for container lock shroud
customer_reviews.text: This lock is great. Extremely well built, sturdy, and large. So large, in fact, that the body is too thick to fit inside of a lock shroud on a shipping container :( Other than that, it seems like a great lock
customer_reviews.author: Stevie Biscuits

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Lock it and forget it, there are far more weaker links in the security chain
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Tough lock
customer_reviews.text: Heavy duty and tough. I can't see anyone getting through this in a hurry, not without making a lot of noise anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works for what we wanted
customer_reviews.text: We ordered this for a shed lock as we are not on our property 24/7. Had no problems and works exactly what we wanted. Keys are sometimes hard to get into lock though.
customer_reviews.author: Judy W.

customer_reviews.title: A small price for big security!
customer_reviews.text: Very well engineered! Hard and soft soft security features make it virtually impenetrable to all but the most determined criminal.
customer_reviews.author: Samuel J.

customer_reviews.title: A little big for storage lockers, but one hell of a secure lock.
customer_reviews.text: I ended up not being able to use this for my storage locker, but it is an incredible lock no less.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew V.

customer_reviews.title: This lock is no joke! If you have to ...
customer_reviews.text: This lock is no joke! If you have to secure a high priced or valuable item this is the lock for you.
customer_reviews.author: Frank

customer_reviews.title: this lock rocks!
customer_reviews.text: excellent lock! well made, worth every penny, wish I never bought the sobo locks, this is by far 100% superior to those locks!
customer_reviews.author: Bob E Long, Pistol Instructor, Freedom Ranch Pistol Academy, Bristow, OK  ccw-ok

customer_reviews.title: Very good lock and appears very secure
customer_reviews.text: Very good lock and appears very secure. It's going to be hard to cut through this thing! Worked perfect with the 14KS 6' 9/16 ABUS chain.
customer_reviews.author: Jaydub

customer_reviews.title: Big, heavy, and secure
customer_reviews.text: Seriously secure, but at a premium price. It's a no-nonsense lock for sure. It's quite big and quite heavy, so it's great for storing my bike at home, but would be hard to use on anything you want to take with you. My only complaint is that the hasp is not captive, when you unlock it you can remove it entirely. Not a big deal, but I'd personally prefer if it stayed affixed and just swiveled out of the way. Easier to prevent it from getting lost.
customer_reviews.author: A.F.L.

customer_reviews.title: Beast of a lock
customer_reviews.text: Great lock! Will make any thief think twice, and then a third time, before attempting to steal my bike! Like that you can rekey this version. Will last through my lifetime.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan L.

customer_reviews.title: A great lock
customer_reviews.text: Strong lock for motorbikes but not an impossible to break. Very pricey lock.
customer_reviews.author: Ilan Peery

customer_reviews.title: So strong...do not lose the key!
customer_reviews.text: This padlock is known as the ultimate in protection, impervious to lock picking or lock cutting.
customer_reviews.author: Easy Rider

customer_reviews.title: Nice big lock
customer_reviews.text: Very nice build quality. Would take a bit of effort to get it to open.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: solid lock.
customer_reviews.text: Worked with ABUS 14KS 6' Maximum Security Square Chain and Sleeve. I feel pretty secure now with my Grom. Be sure to slide one link thru another then latch. Its not big enough to hold two links next to each other.
customer_reviews.author: donovan obrien

customer_reviews.title: Very Large Lock
customer_reviews.text: This appears to be a very high quality, very well made lock. However, it would not fit the storage unit I tried to put it on. Somewhere in the description, they should make it clear that the shackle is extremely large diameter steel, and it will not pass thru the common hole size of a typical hasp.... I was also warned right away to never lose the keys... My impression of it was, very nice quality. But it's too big to fit anything. I sent it back.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick7904

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic lock, solid
customer_reviews.text: I love this lock. It's one of those products that you will have until the day you die and your kids will probably pass it along as well. I paired it with an Abus 14ks 2-ft security chain, and that combination is SOLID. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: David T

customer_reviews.title: Glock of locks, works great!  I have 6 and will buy more as I need them.  My business is growing and I trust ABUS to secure it.
customer_reviews.text: I own 6 of these locks. They work fantastic! If you need s secure lock and chain, look no further. The 12 or 14KS compliments it perfectly! This lock is the Glock of locks. IT WORKS!
customer_reviews.author: J. Roberts

customer_reviews.title: would love to see someone try to get past
customer_reviews.text: This lock is extremely tough, would love to see someone try to get past it
customer_reviews.author: B. Corsini

customer_reviews.title: Buy the Abus latch that goes with this lock.
customer_reviews.text: This is one big strong lock. You need to buy the Abus latch as the lock is large and won't go through a standard latch. I put this on my shed and feel pretty sure that no one can defeat this lock and ride into the sunset on my riding mower.
customer_reviews.author: AL Hedenstrom

customer_reviews.title: Will not fit shipping container
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the 37rk/80 to secure a new standard shipping container. The shackle fit the holes, but the body was too wide to slide up into the lock protection box.
customer_reviews.author: MC

customer_reviews.title: It's a beast!
customer_reviews.text: If you don't need it in a hurry, shop around. Awesome lock.
customer_reviews.author: mac

customer_reviews.title: Wow!
customer_reviews.text: Heavy duty lock. I got it for my connex, and it is pretty sweet. Definitely a confidence booster.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Strongest padlock on the planet
customer_reviews.text: Using the Granit 37/80 to secure my custom made stainless steel lock box. Chose the Granit 37 for the removable shackle that locks on both sides. Plus the "pick proof" Abus Plus cylinder lock. This padlock commands respect, and presents experienced thieves with a formidable challenge.
customer_reviews.author: David Maxwell

customer_reviews.title: great lock
customer_reviews.text: Great lock. Remember only one thick link will fit through the shackle so you will need a chain like the ABUS 14KS 6' Maximum Security Square Chain with one long pass through link.
customer_reviews.author: Enoch Jones

customer_reviews.title: This is a padlock
customer_reviews.text: Most excellent product. Requires a noose type chain due to shrouded shackle.
customer_reviews.author: Martin Fox

customer_reviews.title: I would definitely recommend any product made by Abus
customer_reviews.text: We have purchased several Abus security steel padlocks. Although a little "pricey", they are exceptionally well-made and worth the money. I would definitely recommend any product made by Abus. They produce terrific products.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Beth Stull

customer_reviews.title: A very solid lock, bolt cutter resistant, and ...
customer_reviews.text: A very solid lock, bolt cutter resistant, and the shackle can be removed completely. Shackle is thick, so make sure you have a chain with large links.
customer_reviews.author: PETER T PARK

customer_reviews.title: This is a beast of a lock, very strong ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a beast of a lock, very strong and very difficult to pick. I think just looking at it would convince most thieves to look for easier pickings.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth B.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome lock
customer_reviews.text: This is one heck of a lock. Solid, thick, and looks like it could secure a tank. I had researched locks for my storage unit and this would have fit perfectly . . . unfortunately, it was shipped without a key. Being unpickable, it's now a paperweight. I got refunded the cost of the lock. I still want to get one, but I'm now looking elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: E. D'Alise

customer_reviews.title: Lock Your Boat Trailer While Boating On The Lake !
customer_reviews.text: Even a blonde can use it! Purchased this with the ABUS six foot chain to lock up my boat in storage. Once, when we trailered it to a lake, somebody stole our crank. We had to dig thru their little junk yard to be able to pull the boat out of the water. Now we have a spare crank. But I was smart enough to lock up my boat trailer while we were cruising the lake. It would be really easy to jack someones trailer so I suggest y'all lock up your boat trailers while you're out playing on the lake. ABUS is very sturdy and they're not even going to try to mess with this lock n chain.
customer_reviews.author: TinkerBell7

customer_reviews.title: I like the description of the pad lock
customer_reviews.text: I like the description of the pad lock, but I don't know how effective it is until that time comes
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... was already open on arrival seems to be a good lock just don't like the fact that some one ...
customer_reviews.text: the package was already open on arrival seems to be a good lock just don't like the fact that some one had opened the packaging before i got it
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Arrieta

customer_reviews.title: This lock is MASSIVE!
customer_reviews.text: This lock is MASSIVE! It's huge. It did not fit my storage unit's locker slips, not even close. I have to say it looks unbreakable and an amazing quality of a lock but it will not fit anyone's needs and only very large chain rings etc ...
customer_reviews.author: Fireball's a looker

product_meta.title: ABUS 37/80 Granit Alloy Steel Rekeyable Padlock, Keyed Different
product_meta.description:
ABUS Granit™ padlocks meet highest security standards and are considered to be among the most secure padlocks in the world. Their tensile resistance is over 6 tons. High-quality materials and careful finishing are the basis for the quality of these padlocks that are made in Germany. Innovative luminous keys and the black Granit™ coating for optimal corrosion protection are characteristics of the product series. The ABUS-Plus disk cylinder.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
Granit Extreme Security steel padlock with ABUS 7 disc plus cylinder.
feature_bullets: High Security Steel Padlock: Made from hardened alloy steel, this rekeyable padlock features the ABUS Plus disc cylinder for the highest protection against picking Ideal for securing halls, doors, gates, containers, trucks, and more

Hardened Steel Protection: Our Black GRANIT anti-corrosion coating makes this lock ideal for outdoor applications Comes with a security card to protect against unauthorized key duplicates Includes 2 keys, one with an LED light

Padlocks for Any Application: Discover the variety of our padlocks, from OSHA approved safety locks to heavy duty Granit padlocks and disc locks to brass, steel and aluminum models, to resettable combination, rekeyable and keyed alike locks

The World's Leading Security Manufacturer: We offer a comprehensive line of home, commercial security and worker safety products including padlocks and hasps, chains and cables, key storage and safety devices
Synonymous with Security: When it comes to protecting lives and valuables, ABUS provides security solutions that help you feel safe and secure. We've been innovating security technology since 1924

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars155 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
